name: kings-quest-js13k
description: This is an attempt to port the classic graphic adventure game, King's Quest: The Quest for the Crown to HTML5 using the rules of the js13kgames contest.

scripts.minify-js: terser Logic.js Queue.js Util.js UserInput.js Sprite.js Actor.js Ego.js Game.js ZzFX.micro.js player-small.js --config-file terser_config.json -o min.js

author: Lance Ewing
